author: Nintendo of America
description:
Episode nine of the #Splatoon3 North American League Show is available now! Get a recap of last week's action and check out some fun segments!

Watch this week's Splatoon 3 North American League Event #9 livestream on Saturday, Nov 15 at 4pm PT here: https://youtube.com/live/6oc_qlSd6us

Interested in competing? Register here: https://battlefy.com/nintendovs/splatoon3-north-american-league/

Nintendo Switch Online membership (sold separately) and Nintendo Account required for online features. Membership auto-renews after initial term at the then-current price unless canceled. Not available in all countries. Internet access required for online features. Terms apply. nintendo.com/purchase-terms/

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nintendoameric
title: The Splatoon 3 North American League Show – Episode 9

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Dance the night away this holiday season with Just Dance 2026 Edition, now available on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/just-dance-2026-edition-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1021-01&utm_id=P1021-01  

Dance solo, team up with friends, or create unforgettable memories with family. Bring the fun with 40 fresh tracks from chart topping hits to timeless favorites, including "APT." by ROSÉ & Bruno Mars, "Houdini" by Dua Lipa, "Counting Stars" by OneRepublic, "Hung Up" by Madonna, "All Star" by Smash Mouth, and many more!  

Discover two exciting new ways to play: shake up your dance sessions with Party Mode, where unexpected twists keep the fun going, and enjoy full-body gameplay using your smartphone with the Camera Controller feature for a truly immersive experience! 

#NintendoSwitch #JustDance2026Edition  

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Ni
title: Just Dance 2026 Edition – "You’re In" Trailer – Nintendo Switch

title: #KirbyAirRiders launches Nov 20.

author: Nintendo of America
description:
Pre-order Metroid Prime 4: Beyond now: https://ninten.do/6002tGvJC

The Metroid Prime 4: Beyond game launches December 4, 2025, only on the Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch systems. 

When responding to a distress call from the Galactic Federation, Samus Aran becomes entangled in an unexpected disaster. Now, she must explore the unknown planet Viewros in this first-person adventure.

Master Samus's core abilities, ride Vi-O-La through Sol Valley, and make use of mysterious powers called Psychic Abilities as you fight to survive and find a way home in Metroid Prime 4: Beyond.

Nintendo Switch 2 players who have Metroid Prime 4: Beyond on Nintendo Switch can upgrade to the Nintendo Switch 2 Edition by purchasing the upgrade pack.

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica

title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition — Overview Trailer
